articles.title: Cryptoverse: Ethereum upgrade to unlock $33 billion - Reuters
articles.description: Investors are finally set to gain access to more than $33 billion of ether this week under a planned revamp of the blockchain.
articles.content:
April 11 (Reuters) - Investors are finally set to gain access to more than $33 billion of ether this week under a planned revamp of the blockchain.

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: PC shipments fell sharply last quarter, with Apple among hardest hit - The Verge
articles.description: Worldwide shipments of desktops and laptops suffered a drop of around 30 percent in the first quarter of 2023. IDC reports a drop of 29 percent to 56.9 million units, while Canalys reports a drop of 32.6 percent to 54 million units.
articles.content:
